text:
@realDonaldTrump From apple packing houses in Washington state to farm workers in Florida & a California county known as “the world’s salad bowl”, outbreaks of the novel coronavirus are emerging at US fruit and vegetable farms and packing plants.

Where is bunker trump? playing it down as usual?
